Description_lang: Decreases the cooldown on your Hand of Reckoning ability by ${$m1/-1000} sec and increases the damage done by your Hammer of the Righteous ability by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Decreases the cooldown on your Hand of Reckoning ability by 2 sec and increases the damage done by your Hammer of the Righteous ability by 5%.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce el tiempo de reutilización de tu facultad Mano de expiación 2 s y aumenta un 5% el daño infligido por tu facultad Martillo del honrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 2 s a recarga da sua habilidade Ato de Bravura e aumenta em 5% o dano causado pelas sua habilidade Martelo do Íntegro.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Abklingzeit Eurer Fähigkeit 'Hand der Abrechnung' um 2 Sek. und erhöht den Schaden Eurer Fähigkeit 'Hammer der Rechtschaffenen' um 5%.
description_blz.en_GB: Decreases the cooldown on your Hand of Reckoning ability by 2 sec and increases the damage done by your Hammer of the Righteous ability by 5%.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce el tiempo de reutilización de tu facultad Mano de expiación 2 s y aumenta un 5% el daño infligido por tu facultad Martillo del honrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le temps de recharge de votre technique Main de rétribution de 2 s et augmente les dégâts infligés par votre technique Marteau du vertueux de 5%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il tempo di recupero di Imposizione della Sfida di 2 s e aumenta i danni inflitti da Martello del Virtuoso del 5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Сокращает время восстановления способности "Длань возмездия" на 2 сек. и увеличивает урон, наносимый способностью "Молот праведника", на 5%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 집행의 재사용 대기시간이 2초만큼 감소하고 정의의 망치의 공격력이 5%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你清算聖禦的冷卻時間縮短2秒，公正之錘造成的傷害提高5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的清算之手技能的冷却时间缩短2秒，正义之锤技能造成的伤害提高5%。
